name: tpr2uni

body.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)), cxp(cr, cr))
-| wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)), cxp(cr, cr))
-| wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cr, cr), cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)))
-| wcel(co(c0, ctx, c0), cfv(ctopon, cxp(cr, cr)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)), cxp(cr, cr))
-| wcel(co(c0, ctx, c0), cfv(ctopon, cxp(cr, cr)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, ctx, c0), cfv(ctopon, cxp(cr, cr)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cuni(co(c0, ctx, c0)), cxp(cr, cr))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))

comment: The usual topology on ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is the product topology of the usual topology on ` RR ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2017.)
